T02D2088:163b-0: @163b * // bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2088:163b-1: dngos grub bsgrub dang bar chad bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2088:163b-2: gtor ma'i las la rnal 'byor 'bad par bya //
T02D2088:163b-3: h'um las sna tshogs rdo rje ni //
T02D2088:163b-4: bar snang la gnas bsam par bya //
T02D2088:163b-5: aa las byung ba'i thod pa ni //
T02D2088:163b-6: de yi 'og tu bsam par bya //
T02D2088:163b-7: bdud rtsi aom gyis mtshan pa ni //
T02D2088:163b-8: de yi nang du bsam par bya //
T02D2088:163b-12: ram las me yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2088:163b-13: thod pa'i 'og tu bsam par bya //
T02D2088:163b-14: yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D2088:163b-15: me yi 'og tu bsam par bya //
T02D2088:163b-16: go las shar du ba glang sha / ku las
T02D2088:163b-17: lho ru khyi yi sha / da las nub tu
T02D2088:163b-18: rta yi sha / ha las byang du blang chen
T02D2088:163b-19: sha / na las dbus su sha chen bsam //
T02D2088:164a-0: bi las shar du dri chen @164a * //
T02D2088:164a-2: shu las lho ru byang chub sems //
T02D2088:164a-3: ra las nub tu rang byung mtshal //
T02D2088:164a-4: ma las byang du dri chu bsam //
T02D2088:164a-5: mu las dbus su sman chen bsam //
T02D2088:164a-6: shar du bh'am la lho ru a'am //
T02D2088:164a-7: nub tu dzr'im la byang du kham //
T02D2088:164a-8: dbus su h'um yig rnam par bsam //
T02D2088:164a-9: steng du rdo rje rgya gram bsgom //
T02D2088:164a-10: yam las rlung byung me sbar la //
T02D2088:164a-11: thod pa dros pas bdud rtsi khol //
T02D2088:164a-12: rlangs las 'od byung rigs lnga bskul //
T02D2088:164a-13: ye shes bdud rtsi phab la bstim //
T02D2088:164a-14: rdo rje yig 'bru bcas pa zhu //
T02D2088:164a-15: 'bru gsum sngags kyis byin gyis brlab //
T02D2088:164a-16: gnyis su med pa'i mchod pa dbul //
T02D2088:164a-17: mchod bstod smon lam rgyas par bya //
T02D2088:164a-18: aom ya ma k'a la sarba tu pa sata ma
T02D2088:164a-19: h'a ba lim ai dam grihna grihna kha kha kh'a
T02D2088:164a-20: hi kh'a hi // gtor ma dbul lo //
T02D2088:164a-21: bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2088:164a-22: sgrib dang bar chad nye bar bsal ba'i phyir //
T02D2088:164a-23: khrus kyi snod dag mdun du brtan par bya //
T02D2088:164a-24: lto ldir mgrin pa phra ba'i bum pa la ;
T02D2088:164a-25: / kha tshar ma nyams ras kyis mgul chings bya //
T02D2088:164a-26: 'bras bu lo 'dab ma nyams kha rgyan can //
T02D2088:164a-27: lus ngag yid gsum dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2088:164a-28: dkar gsum mngar gsum ldan pa'i chu yis dgang //
T02D2088:164a-29: phung po lnga po dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2088:164a-30: 'bru sna lnga yi snying po ldan bar bya //
T02D2088:164a-31: yan lag lnga po dag par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2088:164a-32: sman sna lnga yi dri dang ldan par bya //
T02D2088:164a-33: ye shes lnga po rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir //
T02D2088:164a-34: rin chen lnga yi snying po ldan par bya //
T02D2088:164a-35: bdag lus lha yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis //
T02D2088:164a-36: bhr'um las bum pa gzhal yas khang chen bsam //
T02D2088:164a-37: dbus su ya las bcom ldan gshin rje'i gshed //
T02D2088:164a-38: gshed bzhi 'khor dang phyi rol bcas pa bskyed //
T02D2088:164a-39: gzungs thag rang gi snying gar bzung nas ni //
T02D2088:164a-40: ting nge 'dzin gyis sngags kyi bzlas pa bya //
T02D2088:164a-41: rang gi snying ga'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas //
T02D2088:164a-42: skud pa'i lam nas yang kyi thugs kar zhugs //
T02D2088:164a-43: tshur la 'phros pas rang gi h'um la thim //
T02D2088:164a-44: bcu gsum sngags la rten 'brel btags pa bzlas //
T02D2088:164a-45: 'od dang du pa byung byung bsnyen pa bya //
T02D2088:164a-46: bsnyen pa thon nas gtsang ba'i dbus 'dus nas //
T02D2088:164a-47: yab yum gnyis med snyoms par zhugs pa yis //
T02D2088:164a-48: byang chub sems kyi chu yis khrus bya'o //
